text: Montréverd is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Saint-André-Treize-Voies (the seat), Mormaison and Saint-Sulpice-le-Verdon.Arrêté préfectoral 15 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Montréverd
